name: Sparkle

traceMaterials.itemName: Past Evils of the Borehole Planet Disaster

story: A member of the Masked Fools. Inscrutable and unscrupulous.A dangerous maestro of theatrics, utterly engrossed in the art of performance. Adorned with innumerable masks, she is the hero with a thousand faces.Wealth, status, power... None of those matters to Sparkle. The only thing that can get her attention is "amusement."

skills.name: Monodrama
skills.description: Deals minor Quantum DMG to a single enemy.

skills.name: Dreamdiver
skills.description: Increases an ally's CRIT DMG and Advances Forward their action.

skills.name: The Hero with a Thousand Faces
skills.description: Recovers Skill Points for the team, and enables the DMG Boost provided by Sparkle's Talent to be additionally enhanced.

skills.name: Red Herring
skills.description: Increases the team's Max Skill Points. Whenever an ally consumes Skill Points, enables all allies to deal more damage.

skills.name: Unreliable Narrator
skills.description: Using the Technique grants all allies Misdirect. Characters with Misdirect will not be detected by enemies, and entering battle while in Misdirect recovers Skill Points for allies.

eidolons.name: Suspension of Disbelief
eidolons.description: The Cipher effect granted by the Ultimate lasts for 1 extra turn. All allies with Cipher have their ATK increased by 40%.

eidolons.name: Purely Fictitious
eidolons.description: Every stack of the Talent's effect allows allies to additionally ignore 8% of the target's DEF when dealing DMG.

eidolons.name: Pipedream
eidolons.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: Life Is a Gamble
eidolons.description: The Ultimate recovers 1 more Skill Point. The Talent additionally increases the Max Skill Points by 1.

eidolons.name: Parallax Truth
eidolons.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Narrative Polysemy
eidolons.description: The CRIT DMG Boost effect provided by the Skill additionally increases by an amount equal to 30% of Sparkle's CRIT DMG. When Sparkle uses Skill, her Skill's CRIT DMG Boost effect will apply to all allies with Cipher. When Sparkle uses her Ultimate, any single ally who benefits from her Skill's CRIT DMG Boost will spread that effect to allies with Cipher.
